question: This actor died in February 2025. This actor's portrayal of the tough and determined Popeye Doyle in the 1971 film "The French Connection" earned him an Academy Award for Best Actor and became one of his most iconic roles. He also starred in the 1992 Western "Unforgiven," which won the Academy Award for Best Picture and earned him a second Oscar, this time for Best Supporting Actor. He served in the United States Marine Corps for four and a half years before pursuing his acting career. Who is this actor, known for his versatile performances in films like "The Conversation," "Hoosiers," and "The Royal Tenenbaums"?
